languages.text: "Нет, Абеляр, Вольный Торговец как раз на троне, а с тобой гниль подреакторная! Да уж, сенешаль, видать ты из ума выжил на старости лет, раз самозванца от {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости не отличаешь". {n}Равор качает головой, и из уха у него стекает струйка крови.{/n}

"No, Abelard. The Rogue Trader sits upon the throne, and you dare drag this reactor sludge onto the bridge! You must have grown senile in your old age, Seneschal, if you cannot even distinguish {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} from an impostor." {n}Ravor shakes his head, a trickle of blood running from his ear.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Нет, Абеляр, Вольный Торговец как раз на троне, а с тобой гниль подреакторная! Да уж, сенешаль, видать ты из ума выжил на старости лет, раз самозванца от {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости не отличаешь". {n}Равор качает головой, и из уха у него стекает струйка крови.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "No, Abelard, the Rogue Trader is on the throne, and you've dragged this reactor sludge into the throne room! You must have grown senile in your old age, Seneschal, if you cannot tell {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} from an impostor." {n}Ravor shakes his head, a trickle of blood running from his ear.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: «No, Abelard. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente está en su trono, ¡y usted va y trae estos detritus de reactor al puente! Senescal, si no distingue a mi{mf|lord|lady} de un{mf||a} impostor{mf||a}, es que ya está senil». {n}Ravor niega con la cabeza y un poco de sangre rezuma de su oreja.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No, Abelard. The Rogue Trader sits upon the throne, and you dare drag this reactor sludge onto the bridge! You must have grown senile in your old age, Seneschal, if you cannot even distinguish {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} from an impostor." {n}Ravor shakes his head, a trickle of blood running from his ear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No, Abelard. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente está en su trono, ¡y usted va y trae estos detritus de reactor al puente! Senescal, si no distingue a mi{mf|lord|lady} de un{mf||a} impostor{mf||a}, es que ya está senil». {n}Ravor niega con la cabeza y un poco de sangre rezuma de su oreja.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: 「やめなさい、アベラルド。自由開拓者が王座に座っているのに、この原子炉の泥をブリッジに持ち込むとは！本物と偽者の区別もつかないとは、老いぼれてきたようだな、家令長」{n}ラヴォアは頭を振り、その耳からポタポタと血が流れる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No, Abelard. The Rogue Trader sits upon the throne, and you dare drag this reactor sludge onto the bridge! You must have grown senile in your old age, Seneschal, if you cannot even distinguish {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} from an impostor." {n}Ravor shakes his head, a trickle of blood running from his ear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「やめなさい、アベラルド。自由開拓者が王座に座っているのに、この原子炉の泥をブリッジに持ち込むとは！本物と偽者の区別もつかないとは、老いぼれてきたようだな、家令長」{n}ラヴォアは頭を振り、その耳からポタポタと血が流れる。{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: “不，阿贝拉德。宝座上的这位才是真正的行商浪人，可你居然把反应堆里钻出来的渣滓带到了舰桥上！看来你是真的老了，总领，居然连行商浪人和冒牌货都区分不清。”{n}雷沃摇了摇头，鲜血顺着耳朵流了出来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No, Abelard. The Rogue Trader sits upon the throne, and you dare drag this reactor sludge onto the bridge! You must have grown senile in your old age, Seneschal, if you cannot even distinguish {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} from an impostor." {n}Ravor shakes his head, a trickle of blood running from his ear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “不，阿贝拉德。宝座上的这位才是真正的行商浪人，可你居然把反应堆里钻出来的渣滓带到了舰桥上！看来你是真的老了，总领，居然连行商浪人和冒牌货都区分不清。”{n}雷沃摇了摇头，鲜血顺着耳朵流了出来。{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: "Nein, Abelard. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} sitzt auf dem Thron und Ihr wagt es, diesen Reaktorabfall auf die Brücke zu schleppen! Ihr müsst im Alter wohl senil geworden sein, Truchsess, wenn Ihr {mf|seine Lordschaft nicht einmal von einem Doppelgänger|ihre Ladyschaft nicht einmal von einer Doppelgängerin} unterscheiden könnt." {n}Ravor schüttelt den Kopf. Ein kleines Rinnsal Blut fließt aus seinem Ohr.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No, Abelard. The Rogue Trader sits upon the throne, and you dare drag this reactor sludge onto the bridge! You must have grown senile in your old age, Seneschal, if you cannot even distinguish {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} from an impostor." {n}Ravor shakes his head, a trickle of blood running from his ear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nein, Abelard. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} sitzt auf dem Thron und Ihr wagt es, diesen Reaktorabfall auf die Brücke zu schleppen! Ihr müsst im Alter wohl senil geworden sein, Truchsess, wenn Ihr {mf|seine Lordschaft nicht einmal von einem Doppelgänger|ihre Ladyschaft nicht einmal von einer Doppelgängerin} unterscheiden könnt." {n}Ravor schüttelt den Kopf. Ein kleines Rinnsal Blut fließt aus seinem Ohr.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: « Non, Abélard. C'est bien {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} qui est actuellement {mf|assis|assise} sur le trône. Alors que vous, vous osez amener ce déchet de l'espace sur la passerelle ! Le sénéchal serait-il devenu sénile au point de ne plus pouvoir distinguer Sa Seigneurie d'{mf|un imposteur|une impostrice} ? »{n}Alors que Ravor secoue la tête, vous remarquez un filet de sang coulant de son oreille.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No, Abelard. The Rogue Trader sits upon the throne, and you dare drag this reactor sludge onto the bridge! You must have grown senile in your old age, Seneschal, if you cannot even distinguish {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} from an impostor." {n}Ravor shakes his head, a trickle of blood running from his ear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Non, Abélard. C'est bien {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} qui est actuellement {mf|assis|assise} sur le trône. Alors que vous, vous osez amener ce déchet de l'espace sur la passerelle ! Le sénéchal serait-il devenu sénile au point de ne plus pouvoir distinguer Sa Seigneurie d'{mf|un imposteur|une impostrice} ? »{n}Alors que Ravor secoue la tête, vous remarquez un filet de sang coulant de son oreille.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: "Hayır Abelard. Hür Tacir tahtta oturuyor. Bu reaktör çöpünü köprüye getirmişsin! Eğer {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ni bir sahtekârdan ayıramıyorsan yaşlılıktan bunamış olmalısın Seneşal." {n}Ravor başını sallıyor, kulaklarından kan sızıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No, Abelard. The Rogue Trader sits upon the throne, and you dare drag this reactor sludge onto the bridge! You must have grown senile in your old age, Seneschal, if you cannot even distinguish {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} from an impostor." {n}Ravor shakes his head, a trickle of blood running from his ear.{/n}
